    Choose Adaptive Number of Bins

    choose_adaptive_nbins.Rd

    Choose Adaptive Number of Bins

    Usage

    choose_adaptive_nbins(
  expr_data,
  min_bins = 5,
  max_bins = 30,
  min_cells_per_bin = 75
)

    Arguments

    expr_data

    Expression data

    min_bins

    Minimum number of bins

    max_bins

    Maximum number of bins

    min_cells_per_bin

    Minimum cells per bin

    Value

    Number of bins
